description: This header file declares external API functions related to socket operations within the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It includes function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, initializing, and shutting down socket objects, serving as an interface for external components to interact with socket implementations.

methods.name: AnscCreateSocket
methods.description: Creates a socket instance with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: AnscSocketCreate
methods.description: Creates a socket object with specified contexts.

methods.name: AnscSocketRemove
methods.description: Removes the socket object, freeing resources.

methods.name: AnscSocketEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrols necessary objects into the socket instance.

methods.name: AnscSocketShutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the socket object, cleaning up resources.
